channel.title: What is a good server?
channel.description:
[b]What is a good server?[/b]
- It works well.
[b]What it should contain?[/b]
- Good forums , easy to use, perfect xp-rate for all , Good item drops, It must be F2P everytime, Keep players happy & staff team (admins and mods) must be active!) etc.
[b]How can I make this go smoothly?[/b]
- Listen to players. Try to make their wishes true. Why create a server? If you do not know what the players want so do not make a server then! But if you really have skills to do server what players are dreaming then your server will ROCK!
[b][u]This was only my opinion on the matter[/u][/b]

item.title: What is a good server?
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“RSCDream, post:3, topic:436425”][quote author=imabeast link=topic=539139.msg3945389#msg3945389 date=1331806890]
I just looked in the advertisement section, seems like only 1 stable server is up atm, guess i’ll go back to real RSC for now

btw that 1 server has none of those qualities. lol
[/quote]

Yea thats right :D. So many new servers comes out but they’re online only 2 days.[/quote]There have actually been a few good ones too, but you know who doesnt stand competition.

Read full topic

@RSCDream wrote:

What is a good server?

  • It works well.

What it should contain?

  • Good forums , easy to use, perfect xp-rate for all , Good item drops, It must be F2P everytime, Keep players happy & staff team (admins and mods) must be active!) etc.

How can I make this go smoothly?

  • Listen to players. Try to make their wishes true. Why create a server? If you do not know what the players want so do not make a server then! But if you really have skills to do server what players are dreaming then your server will ROCK!

This was only my opinion on the matter
